title.value: Проблемные вопросы инноваций в АПК Беларуси
Problems of innovations' development in agroindustrial complex of Belarus
Problems of innovations' development in agroindustrial complex of Belarus

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Latushko, M.I., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Development of high-tech industries, connected with application of high technologies, nowadays determines general tendencies of global economy. Therefore, innovative model of the economy provides the most effective way of economic development. In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus rate of the development of innovations, determining high competitiveness of Belarusian goods is rather low. General problems, external and internal factors, preventing development of innovations in agricultural organizations of the Republic of Belarus are revealed in the article. The most important contradictions between existing economic system and innovation development are analyzed. Obsolescence of manpower capability and its influence on the process of the development of technological and practical sphere of economy is evaluated. The most important directions, influencing the economic development and efficiency of innovative policy are outlined.
